actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 1992, the duty on 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and on mixtures of 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and application adjuvants, with or without stabilizers.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1992, the duty on: (1) 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one; and (2) mixtures of 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and application adjuvants, with or without stabilizers.

titles.title: A bill to suspend until December 31, 1992, the duty on 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and on mixtures of 4,5-dichloro-2-n-octyl-4-isothiazolin-3-one and application adjuvants, with or without stabilizers.
